messages.message: Hi team, JPMC have an engineer who has recently updated their email address and they are looking to update IB to match this updated email address (accounts are provisioned by SSO) - is there a way they can manually do this via API?

Nope, this is not doable through the API unfortunately. Email and username changes were actually things we explicitly wanted to disallow changing. So the only way to do it now is with a SQL query directly against the DB.
I can send you over a SQL query. Is there a zendesk ticket I can update?
@Heymian there isn't (was a casual question from JPMC), if you can share it with me I'll raise a ticket tomorrow and upload it there :)

This is the query. Note that we generally strongly discourage all our customers from directly making any DB queries directly, so this is a special case.
`UPDATE users SET email = "<new-email>" WHERE email = "<old-email>";`
